title: Handkerchief, "In Memoriam", 1901
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Frame H x W: 46.4 x 46.4 cm (18 1/4 x 18 1/4 in.)
Textile H xW: 38.1 x 38.4 cm (15 x 15 1/8 in.)
description: Three-quarter portrait bust of Queen Victoria in the center. At the top, "In Memoriam." At the bottom: "Alexandrina - Victoria Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland Empress of India." On the left side: "Born in Kensington Palace May 24th, 1819." On the right side "Died in Osborne House Jan'y 22nd, 1901. Printed in black on a white ground, with a black and white striped border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, "In Memoriam", 1901.
1901. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Gift of Paul F. Walter. 2008-21-1.
